entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -12.6°C

entry.title: Sunday: Mainly sunny. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 19 this morning and minus 14 this afternoon. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 23. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind north 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Low minus 23. Wind chill near minus 28. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 11:30 AM CDT Sunday 26 March 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 9.
